Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, this product stands out as a top-of-the-line solution in its category. Considering its exceptional craftsmanship and versatility, we believe it's worth more than $150. However, to make it accessible to you, I am offering it at an introductory price of $180. This special offer is valid for a limited time only, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
